title: How to Use Note Taker
text: Add your note title and detail on the right. As soon as you start typing, the Save button will appear in the upper right-hand corner. To save your note, click the Save button. Your note will now appear on the list on the left. You can access your previous notes at any time by clicking on them. You can also delete any of your notes by clicking on the trashcan button next to the note title on the left. If you wish to delete this note, click on the trashcan. When you are viewing a previous note, you can add a new note by clicking on the pencil icon in the upper right-hand corner.
